option.description: EC oscillator mode. CLKIN function on RA5/CLKIN
option.name: EC

option.description: Internal oscillator mode. I/O function on RA5/CLKIN
option.name: INT

option.description: MCLR pin is MCLR function with internal weak pullup
option.name: ON

option.description: Program memory code protection is disabled
option.name: OFF

option.description: Program memory code protection is enabled
option.name: ON

option.description: BOR enabled during operation and disabled in Sleep
option.name: SLEEP_DIS

setting.name: WRT
setting.description: Flash Program Memory Self Write Enable bit

option.description: CLKOUT function disabled. CLKOUT pin acts as I/O
option.name: OFF

option.description: CLKOUT function enabled. CLKOUT pin is CLKOUT
option.name: ON

setting.name: G1FSIM
setting.description: COGx Falling Source Input mode bit

setting.name: G1RSIM
setting.description: COGx Rising Source Input mode bit

setting.name: G1DBF
setting.description: Falling Event Dead-band Count Value bits

setting.name: G1DBR
setting.description: Rising Event Dead-band Count Value bits

setting.name: G1BLKF
setting.description: Falling Event Blanking Count Value bits

setting.name: G1BLKR
setting.description: Rising Event Blanking Count Value bits

setting.name: G1PH
setting.description: Rising Edge Phase Delay Count Value bits

setting.name: H1REREN
setting.description: Hardware Limit Timer 1 Rising Edge Reset Enable bit

setting.name: H1FEREN
setting.description: Hardware Limit Timer 1 Falling Edge Reset Enable bit

setting.name: H1ERS
setting.description: Hardware Limit Timer 1 Peripheral Reset Select bits
